message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I'm willing to let it go for $130. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $125. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can do $115, and that's as low as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $122. It's my best offer, and I think it's a great deal for both of us!

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice, but I'm still a bit away from my budget. I can do $118, and that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $121. It's my final offer, and I think it's a great deal for both of us!
I'm not willing to go any higher than my previous offer of $118. I'm afraid I'll have to pass on this deal. I appreciate your time and consideration, but I think I'll have to explore other options.
